name: Zasalamel
title: The Time Reaper
subtitle: A powerful warrior who manipulates time and souls to dominate the battlefield
lore: A mysterious warrior cursed with immortality, Zasalamel has mastered the arts of time manipulation and soul harvesting. His mastery over his massive scythe and ability to control temporal forces makes him a formidable opponent. Despite his fearsome powers, he seeks to understand the true meaning of his eternal existence.

passive.name: Soul Harvest
passive.description: Every time Zasalamel hits an enemy champion with an ability, he gains a soul stack (max 5). Each stack increases his AD by [3%] and movement speed by [2%] for 4s.

Q.name: Reap
Q.description: Zasalamel swings his scythe around him, dealing [90/180/300/600/890 + 80% AD] damage to all enemies hit, reducing their armor by [10%] and slowing them by [25%] for 2s.

W.name: Time Bomb
W.description: Zasalamel places a time bomb at a nearby location that activates after 2s. The time bomb explodes in an area, dealing [100/220/400/555/750 + 100% AP] damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by [90%] for 2s.

E.name: Shadowstep
E.description: Zasalamel dashes forward (can pass through walls, refreshing the cooldown once, but not on second wall dash). The ability's cooldown is reduced by 1s whenever Zasalamel hits an ability on a target (including minions and monsters).

R.name: Time Reaper
R.description: Zasalamel marks an area for 1.5s. After the delay, he appears at the marked location, dealing [300/500/700 + 80% AD] damage to all enemies in the area. For each enemy champion hit, Zasalamel gains [20%] bonus movement speed for 3s and his basic abilities cooldowns are reduced by 2s.

1.name: Executioner
1.description: Zasalamel's abilities deal [15%] more damage to enemies below 50% HP.

1.name: Shadow Shield
1.description: Shadowstep now grants a shield that absorbs [100 + 5% max HP] damage for 2s.

1.name: Soul Drain
1.description: Soul Harvest stacks now also grant [2%] lifesteal per stack.

5.name: Time Explosion
5.description: Time Bomb now deals [25%] more damage to enemies in the center of the explosion.

5.name: Extended Reap
5.description: Reap's slow duration is increased by 1s.

5.name: Double Step
5.description: Shadowstep can now store up to 2 charges but has 3s longer cooldown.

10.name: Final Reaping
10.description: Time Reaper now executes enemies below [15%] HP.

10.name: Temporal Shield
10.description: After using Time Reaper, Zasalamel gains [40%] damage reduction for 2s.

15.name: Soul Master
15.description: Soul Harvest maximum stacks increased to 7.

15.name: True Reaping
15.description: Reap now deals true damage to enemies below [30%] HP.

15.name: Time Mark
15.description: Time Bomb now applies a mark that makes the target take [20%] more damage from Zasalamel's abilities for 3s.

20.name: Instant Reaper
20.description: Time Reaper now teleports instantly without delay but deals [30%] less damage.

20.name: Silent Shadow
20.description: Shadowstep now silences enemies passed through for [0.75s].

20.name: Desperate Power
20.description: Zasalamel gains [25%] bonus AD when below 40% HP.

20.name: Soul Empowerment
20.description: Soul Harvest stacks now grant double the bonuses when below 50% HP.

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
